attributes.action: Free child care for working parents
attributes.additional_details: People on benefits don't work but yet get free childcare for 2 year old and over it should be working parents that get this not people on benefits
attributes.background: To give free child care for 2year olds for parents who work and still can't afford to pay childcare costs

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase free childcare for working parents with children under school age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618895

Fund 30 hours free childcare from age 1 for families where both parents work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624461
